summary: A TensorFlow example script that implements the Simple Graph Convolution (SGC) model, trains it on citation network datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) with configurable hyperparameters such as learning rate, epochs, bias, and weight decay, and reports node classification accuracy.
business_intent: Provide a clear, runnable demonstration of a lightweight graph neural network (SGC) for educational and benchmarking purposes, helping developers and researchers quickly evaluate graph convolution techniques on standard citation datasets using TensorFlow.
